data.actual_result: User names push slowmode icon/cooldown timer out of the typing indicator bar
data.expected_result: Typing indicator bar ellipses to give space for the slowmode icon
data.short_description: Users with long names push slowmode icon/cooldown timer out of the typing indicator bar when typing
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with slowmode enabled - Have three users with long names type - Observe the slowmode icon - Send a messae to trigger the slowmode cooldown and observe the cooldown timer
